metadata.title: InstallerCCTV 100ft HD Video Power All-in-One Pre-Made Cable for DVR Surveillance Security CCTV Camera RCA BNC Cable Extension Cord Lead
features: This 100-foot BNC video power cable has 2.1mm and 5.5 mm power connector plugs and is perfect for audio and video making this a versatile extension cord for your home or office.
The camera cable is a prefabricated, multi-purpose conjoined cable, suitable for indoor and outdoor, plug and use
High-quality, 100% pure copper wire, separate structure for durability and long-lasting use.

This cable is compatible with any Analog CCTV camera that includes 720P, 960P, 1080P, 700TVL, 1000TVL, 1200TVL, HD-CVI, HD-TVI, HD-AHD HD-SDI 960H Security Cameras without any interference or decrease in video quality, perfect for CCTV security cameras.
Easy to use for surveillance security CCTV cable, plug-and-play ready and simple to install. 1 Year Warranty and free life time tech support from US
description: InstallerCCTV 100ft Video Power Pre-Made Cable with Extension

HD-TVI HD-CVI AHD Analog 1080p Premade Cable for CCTV Security Cameras - Black 2 Extension Coupler Included  InstallerCCTV Pre-Made Cable is perfect for transmitting HD 1080p signal and simplifies your camera installation process.  With InstallerCCTV Pre-Made Cable, you do not need to cut and crimp the cable and connector again.  Power, BNC connectors are already connected to the cable, making it easy to install your camera security system.  In addition, our new innovative design makes the cable ultra thin & light-weight, but retain quality connection through braiding & foam for anti-interference   This Cable supports 1080p 720p HD-TVI HD-CVI HD-AHD and Analog CCTV format CCTV Cameras.  In addition, it is also compatible with all Amcrest, Kguard, Night Owl, Q-see, Samsung, Swann, Zmodo, ZOSI and other CCTV Cameras with the formats above.
